terms.title: PolyGo Terms of Service
terms.intro: The binding terms and rules governing the use of the PolyGo platform.

items.required: Registration Required: Only registered users can join chat, participate in events, send gifts, or use translation tools.
items.verification: Email/Phone Verification: New accounts must be verified before accessing communication features.
items.age: Age Policy: Users must be at least 13 or 18 years old (depending on local regulations) to register.

items.free: Free Plan: Limited translations, matching attempts, and conversation time.
items.plus: Plus Plan: Unlimited usage and permission to host live events with advanced matching filters.

items.roomCapacity: Room Capacity Limit: Each event room can host a maximum of X participants (configured by Event creator).
items.eventVerification: Event Verification: Event must be verified by admin before being published.
items.entryVerification: Entry Verification: Pre-registration is required to participate in events.
items.callDuration: Call Duration: Free plan users have time limits on voice/video calls; Plus users have no limit.
items.matchingRules: Matching Rules: The matching engine pairs users only when their target and native languages align.
items.cancellation: Event Cancellation: Hosts must cancel at least Y hours before the start time to avoid losing PolyCoins and being restricted from certain rights for a period of time.

items.billingCycle: Billing Cycle for Plus Plan: The Plus subscription renews automatically every month unless cancelled by the user.
items.balance: Balance Requirement: Transactions that exceed the user’s available PolyCoin balance are rejected; the user must top up to complete the purchase.

items.contentModeration: Content Moderation: Admins may lock rooms, delete posts, mute or ban users who violate community guidelines.
items.violationReporting: Violation Reporting: Any member can report content or users; the system logs and forwards reports to admins.
items.activityLogging: Activity Logging: Event activity must be logged and retained for at least N days for security and dispute resolution.
items.adminAuthority: Admin Authority: Only admins can grant bonus PolyCoins, adjust balances due to disputes, or issue refunds according to policy.

items.dataCompliance: Data Protection Compliance: Personal data storage must comply with data-protection laws.
items.informationSharing: Information Sharing: User email addresses and phone numbers cannot be shared with third parties without explicit consent.

guideline.title: Community Guidelines
guideline.intro: A code of conduct to maintain a safe, respectful, and culturally rich learning environment.

items.respect: Respect linguistic and cultural differences; no harassment or discrimination.
items.safety: Do not share sensitive information; be cautious when interacting outside the platform.
items.prohibited: Prohibited content includes violence, pornography, hate speech, cheating, and spam.

items.warnings: Warnings, muting microphone/chat, or feature limitations based on severity.
items.bans: Temporary/permanent bans for repeat or serious violations.
items.appeals: Transparent appeal process through support channels.

policy.title: PolyGo Policies
policy.intro: Core policies to protect privacy, ensure secure payments, and promote a fair learning experience.

items.dataProtection: Protection of personal data, especially sensitive and payment information.
items.aiLogs: AI is used for translation/editing; event logs are kept for safety and quality control.
items.compliance: Compliance with current laws and requirements for content removal when necessary.

items.tiers: Free account has limitations; Plus unlocks all features and benefits.
items.refunds: Principles for refunds/credits when issues are verified.
items.security: Secure payment gateway; card information is not stored on the application server.

items.moderation: Admins may issue warnings, ban accounts, close rooms, or remove violating content.
items.reports: Mechanism for reporting, dispute resolution, and user support.
items.events: Events must comply with platform regulations and local laws.

hero.title: Creating meaningful connections, breaking language barriers
hero.subtitle: PolyGo was founded on the belief that the best way to learn a language is to live in it. We combine the power of AI with a global community to deliver the most authentic cultural exchange experience.

mission.title: Our Core Mission
mission.desc: Our mission is to move beyond traditional language courses. We aim to create a platform where learning is not a chore but a joy of discovery, connection, and cultural immersion.

about.valuesData: [{"title": "Real-World Immersion", "desc": "We prioritize direct communication (chat, voice, video) and cultural events to simulate a real language environment."}, {"title": "AI-Powered Assistance", "desc": "We use instant AI translation and correction to remove barriers, helping learners confidently start conversations."}, {"title": "Safety & Respect", "desc": "Building a positive global community where all cultural and linguistic differences are respected."}, {"title": "Learning through Gamification", "desc": "XP, streak, and leaderboard systems maintain motivation, turning the learning process into an engaging game."}]
about.timelineItemsData: [{"when": "Q3 2023", "title": "MVP Project Kickoff", "subtitle": "Started developing core features: Registration, Profile, and Real-time Text Chat.", "note": "Tech Stack: ReactJS, Node.js/Express, MongoDB."}, {"when": "Q1 2024", "title": "Plus Plan & Payment Launch", "subtitle": "Integrated Stripe/PayPal, deployed PolyCoin system and the Plus subscription (Freemium).", "note": "KPI: Achieved Free to Plus conversion rate of 2%."}, {"when": "Q3 2024", "title": "AI & Event Beta Integration", "subtitle": "Launched instant AI translation/correction and tested the Cultural Event hosting feature.", "note": "The strongest USP was deployed."}, {"when": "Current", "title": "Reached 500K Users", "subtitle": "Completed Gamification features (XP, Leaderboard) and optimized Video call performance (WebRTC).", "note": "Focusing on market expansion into Asia and Europe."}]
about.teamData: {"title": "Meet the Team", "badge": "Global & Multicultural", "desc": "We are a small, multinational team united by a passion for breaking down language barriers and connecting people.", "members": [{"name": "Alex Nguyen", "role": "CEO & Founder", "image": "https://www.misa.vn/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/70-nhung-doanh-nhan-viet-dang-lam-ceo.jpg", "initials": "AN"}, {"name": "Maria Lopez", "role": "Head of Community", "image": "https://forbes.vn/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/VD-596-Copy-1620x1080.jpg", "initials": "ML"}, {"name": "Kenji Tanaka", "role": "Lead AI Engineer", "image": "https://nhaquanly.vn/uploads/images/blog/dangbinh/2024/06/07/ceo-nguyen-van-thanh-1717734282.webp", "initials": "KT"}]}
about.faqItemsData: [{"q": "How is PolyGo different from HelloTalk or Tandem?", "a": "PolyGo focuses on **contextual AI Correction/Translation** and **online Cultural Events (workshops)**, creating a 'language immersion' experience rather than just simple chat."}, {"q": "How does the AI correction work?", "a": "The system uses advanced NLP models to analyze your message in real-time, suggesting more natural phrasing or correcting grammar/vocabulary errors, helping you build confidence."}, {"q": "What are **Language Mini-Games** and why are they important?", "a": "Language Mini-Games are short, interactive games designed to challenge your vocabulary and grammar in a fun way, helping to convert passive knowledge into active use."}]
